tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Chris was an amazing professor for the 1st semester of nursing school! She encourages questions and is very respectful. She is very knowledgeable and has great experiences in the nursing profession. She puts her students first which is very beneficial. Does send a lot of emails, but most are helpful updates. Awesome for clinical as well!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Chris was the perfect first semester professor. She made me feel extremely comfortable in class and really showed how much she cares about her students in more ways than one. Her tests are hard but its nursing school so that is to be expected! Only complaint is that her grading strategy changed with every student. Overall extremely helpful though!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CARING  GET READY TO READ
comments: Chris is phenomenal and will get you where you need to be to succeed in the RN program. She is caring & wants to see her students succeed. She makes sure you know she\'s the boss when it comes to reasoning for answers on exams. Only downfall is she sends out too many emails. That was annoying, but she wants you to ask for help.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Chris is always available either by email or office hours. Just don\'t except motivation or pep talks from her. She\'s a tough grader and hardly ever, ever wrong. She doesn\'t like when you call her out on anything, You\'ll be in the wrong. She says she\'s not trying to trick you, but she sometimes seems too. But it is what it is ;)

comments: Loved her! Best first nursing instructor one could hope for. Very knowledgeable and cares about her students. Wants to see them do well and will help them however she can.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: I took Nur 100. I ENJOYED the class- the quizes were difficult for me because I tend to "read" too much into the questions. Anytime you need questions answered in class or at home she is there. You can email her and she responds quickly. Overall,I enjoyed the class alot and ended up with an A-. She really is a GREAT TEACHER & CARES ABOUT STUDENTS.

comments: Chris was not an easy instructor for NUR 101A & 101B, but she was fair. She was very picky with care plans but at the same time she would suggest better answers. I thought she was just anal at first but I realized that all she did was help me more than I could have ever realized!
